anya-e0803n5:323_2: vandanti, gāthāracanampi kubbanti, evaṁ santepi te saddasatthe kataparicayavasena
anya-e0803n5:323_3: saddasatthato nayaṁ gahetvā tathārūpā gāthāpi cuṇṇiyapadānipi abhisaṅkharonti, “namo
anya-e0803n5:323_4: buddhāyā”tiādīni vatvā ratanattayaṁ vandanti. Ye pana saddasatthe akataparicayā antamaso
anya-e0803n5:323_5: bāladārakā, tepi aññesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā kataparicayavasena “namo buddhāyā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n5:323_6: vatvā ratanattayaṁ vandanti, “namo buddhassā”ti vadantā pana appakatarā. Katthaci
anya-e0803n5:323_7: hi padese kumārake akkharasamayaṁ uggaṇhāpentā garū akkharānamādimhi “namo buddhāyā”ti
anya-e0803n5:323_8: sikkhāpenti, na pana “namo buddhassā”ti, evaṁ santepi pāḷinaye porāṇaṭṭhakathānaye
anya-e0803n5:323_9: ca upaparikkhiyamāne ṭhapetvā gatyatthakammādiṭṭhānacatukkaṁ, pabhedato sattaṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:323_10: vā dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye catutthekavacanassa
anya-e0803n5:323_11: āyādesasahitāni rūpāni na dissanti, tasmā kehici abhisaṅkhatāni “namo buddhāya, buddhāya
anya-e0803n5:323_12: dānaṁ dentī”ti padāni pāḷiṁ patvā “namo buddhassa, buddhassa dānaṁ dentī”ti aññarūpāni
anya-e0803n5:323_13: bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ayaṁ pana pāḷinayaaṭṭhakathānayānurūpena āyādesassa payogaracanā
anya-e0803n5:323_14: – “buddhāya saraṇaṁ gacchati, buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchatī”ti vā, “buddhāya nagaraṁ nenti,
anya-e0803n5:323_15: buddhaṁ nagaraṁ nentī”ti vā, “buddhāya sakkato dhammo, buddhena sakkato dhammo”ti
anya-e0803n5:323_16: vā, “buddhāya jīvitaṁ pariccajati, buddhassa atthāya jīvitaṁ pariccajatī”ti vā, “buddhāya
anya-e0803n5:323_17: apenti aññatitthiyā, buddhasmā apenti aññatitthiyā”ti vā, “buddhāya dhammatā, buddhassa
anya-e0803n5:323_18: dhammatā”ti vā, “buddhāya pasanno, buddhe pasanno”ti vā iti pabhedato imaṁ sattaṭhānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:323_19: vivajjetvā aññattha āyādeso na dissati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n5:326_0: Ettha mahānamakkārapāṭho nāma “namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti
anya-e0803n5:326_1: pāṭho. Atrāpi āyādeso na dissati. Vammikasuttepi “namo karohi nāgassā”ti evaṁ āyādeso
anya-e0803n5:326_2: na dissati. Ambaṭṭhasuttepi “sotthi bhadante hotu rañño, sotthi janapadassa”. Evaṁ āyādeso na dissati.
anya-e0803n5:331: Yesaṁ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṁ buddhagatā satī”ti
anya-e0803n5:332_0: Imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “sammādiṭṭhikassa putto guḷaṁ khipamāno buddhānussatiṁ
anya-e0803n5:332_1: āvajjetvā ‘namo buddhassā’ti vatvā guḷaṁ khipatī”ti āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso
anya-e0803n5:332_3: khipitvāpi kāsetvāpi ‘namo buddhassā’ti tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa namakkāraṁ karosī”ti
anya-e0803n5:332_4: āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso dissati. Tathā tattha tattha “buddhappamukhassa
anya-e0803n5:332_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṁ deti. Tassa purisassa bhattaṁ na ruccati. Samaṇassa rocate
anya-e0803n5:332_6: saccaṁ, buddhassa chattaṁ dhāreti, buddhassa silāghate”tiādinā āyādesavivajjito saddaracanāviseso
anya-e0803n5:332_7: dissati. Evaṁ dānarocanādīsu bahūsu sampadānavisayesu catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṁ rūpaṁ na dissati.
anya-e0803n5:333_0: Gatyatthakammādīsu pana catūsu ṭhānesu dissati. Tathā hi “mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo
anya-e0803n5:333_1: saggāya gacchatī”ti cettha gatyatthakammani dissati. Ettha hi “mūlaṁ paṭikasseyya,
anya-e0803n5:333_2: appo saggaṁ gacchatī”ti ca attho. “Paṭikasseyyā”ti cettha kasa gatiyanti dhātussa
anya-e0803n5:333_3: patiupasaggena visesitattā “ākaḍḍheyyā”ti attho bhavati. “Ayaṁ puriso mama atthakāmo,
anya-e0803n5:333_4: yo maṁ gahetvāna dakāya netī”ti ettha nayanatthakammani dissati. Ettha hi maṁ udakaṁ
anya-e0803n5:333_5: neti, attano vasanakasobbhaṁ pāpetīti attho. “Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti
anya-e0803n5:333_6: ettha vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mama vacanato viramathāti hi nissakkavacanavasena
anya-e0803n5:333_7: attho. “Mahāgaṇāya bhattā me”ti etthāpi vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mama mahato haṁsagaṇassa
anya-e0803n5:333_8: bhattāti hi sāmivacanavasena attho. Mama haṁsarājāti cettha adhippāyo. “Asakkatā
anya-e0803n5:333_9: casma dhanañcayāyā”ti etthāpi vibhattivipariṇāme dissati. Mayaṁ dhanañcayassa rañño
anya-e0803n5:333_10: asakkatā ca bhavāmāti hi kattutthe sāmivacanaṁ. Tathā hi “dhanañcayassā”ti vā “dhanañcayenā”ti
anya-e0803n5:333_11: vā vattabbe evaṁ avatvā “dhanañcayāyā”ti sampadānavacanaṁ dānakriyādikassa sampadānavisayassa
anya-e0803n5:333_12: abhāvato vibhattivipariṇāmeyeva yujjati, tasmā dhanañcayarājena mayaṁ asakkatā ca
anya-e0803n5:333_13: bhavāmāti attho gahetabbo. Aññampi vibhattivipariṇāmaṭṭhānaṁ maggitabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:334_0: “Virāgāya upasamāya nirodhāyā”tiādīni pana anekasahassāni āyādesasahitāni saddarūpāni
anya-e0803n5:334_1: tadatthe pavattanti. Aṭṭhakathācariyāpi hi dhammavinayasaddatthaṁ vaṇṇentā “dhammānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:334_2: vinayāya. Anavajjadhammatthañhesa vinayo, na bhavabhogādiattha”nti tadatthavaseneva
anya-e0803n5:334_3: āyādesasahitaṁ saddarūpaṁ payuñjiṁsu, evaṁ catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni
anya-e0803n5:334_4: gatyatthakammani nayanatthakammani vibhattivipariṇāme tadatthe cāti imesu catūsuyeva
anya-e0803n5:334_5: ṭhānesu dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye. Tathā
anya-e0803n5:334_6: hi niruttipiṭake “atthāyāti sampadānavacana”nti āyādesasahitaṁ saddarūpaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:334_7: purisasaddādivasena pana tādisāni rūpāni na vuttāni tādisānaṁ saddarūpānaṁ yattha
anya-e0803n5:334_8: katthaci appavattanato. Kaccāyanappakaraṇepi hi “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti lakkhaṇassa
anya-e0803n5:334_9: vuttiyaṁ “atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vuttaṁ. “Purisāyā”ti vā “samaṇāyā”ti
anya-e0803n5:335_0: Ettha siyā – nanu bho tasseva vuttiyaṁ “catutthīti kimatthaṁ purisassa mukhaṁ. Ekavacanassāti
anya-e0803n5:335_1: kimatthaṁ purisānaṁ dadāti. Vāti kimatthaṁ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā”ti
anya-e0803n5:335_2: vuttattā “purisāya samaṇāya brāhmaṇāyā”tiādīni padarūpāni nayato dassitāni, kevalaṁ
anya-e0803n5:335_3: pana mukhasaddayogato bahuvacanabhāvato vikappanato ca “purisāyā”tiādīni na sijjhanti,
anya-e0803n5:335_4: mukhasaddayogādivirahite pana ṭhāne avassaṁ sijjhantīti? Ettha vuccate – “catutthīti
anya-e0803n5:335_5: kimatthaṁ purisassa mukha”nti vadanto “sace āyādeso bhaveyya, catutthiyā eva bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:335_6: na chaṭṭhiyā”ti dassento “mukha”nti padaṁ dassesi, na ca tena “mukhasaddaṭṭhāne detītiādike
anya-e0803n5:335_7: sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade ṭhite āyādeso hotī”ti dasseti. “Ekavacanassāti kimatthaṁ
anya-e0803n5:335_8: purisānaṁ dadātī”ti vadantopi “ekavacanasseva āyādeso hoti, na bahuvacanassā”ti dasseti.
anya-e0803n5:335_9: “Dadātī”ti idaṁ padaṁ “purisāna”nti padassa sampadānavacanattaṁ ñāpetuṁ avoca, na
anya-e0803n5:335_10: ca “detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade sati catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hotī”ti
anya-e0803n5:335_11: imamatthaṁ viññāpeti. “Vāti kimatthaṁ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā”ti ca
anya-e0803n5:335_12: vadantopi “sampadāneyeva vikappena āyādeso hotī”ti viññāpeti, na dānādikriyaṁ paṭicca
anya-e0803n5:336_0: Yadi pana dānādikriyaṁ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṁ siyā, vuttikārakena lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṁ
anya-e0803n5:336_2: vattabbaṁ siyā, na ca vuttaṁ. Kasmāti ce? Buddhavacane porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu ca tādisassa
anya-e0803n5:336_3: payogassa abhāvā. Niruttipiṭake hi pabhinnapaṭisambhido so āyasmā mahākaccāno “purisassa
anya-e0803n5:336_4: dīyate”ti āyādesarahitāniyeva rūpāni dasseti, “atthāyāti sampadānavacana”nti bhaṇantopi
anya-e0803n5:336_5: ca thero dānādikriyāpekkhaṁ akatvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṁ rūpameva niddisi.
anya-e0803n5:336_6: Tena so payogo tadatthappayogoti viññāyati. Iti imehi kāraṇehi jānitabbaṁ “dānādikriyaṁ
anya-e0803n5:336_7: paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṁ na kata”nti. Yajjevaṁ “atthāya hitāyā”tiādīniyeva tadatthappayogāni
anya-e0803n5:336_8: “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti lakkhaṇassa visayā bhaveyyuṁ, nāññānīti? Tanna, aññānipi
anya-e0803n5:336_9: visayāyeva tassa. Katamāni? “Mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo saggāya gacchati, dakāya neti,
anya-e0803n5:336_10: viramathāyasmanto mamavacanāya, gaṇāya bhattā”tiādīni. “Saggassa gamanena vā”tiādīni
anya-e0803n5:337_0: Nanu ca bho evaṁ sante vuttikārakena mūlodāharaṇesu “atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti
anya-e0803n5:337_1: vatvā “mūlāya paṭikasseyyā”tiādīnipi vattabbāni, kimudāharaṇe pana “vāti kimatthaṁ
anya-e0803n5:337_2: saggassa gamanena vā”ti vattabbanti? Saccaṁ, avacane kāraṇamatthi, taṁ suṇātha –
anya-e0803n5:337_3: “mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo saggāya gacchatī”ti ettha hi “mūlāya, saggāyā”ti padāni
anya-e0803n5:337_4: suddhasampadānavacanāni na honti gatyatthakammani vattanato, tasmā mūlodāharaṇesu
anya-e0803n5:337_5: na vuttāni. Tathā “dakāya netī”ti ettha “dakāyā”ti padaṁ nayanatthakammani vattanato
anya-e0803n5:337_6: suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti na vuttaṁ. “Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti ettha
anya-e0803n5:337_7: pana “vacanāyā”ti padaṁ nissakkavacanatthe vattanato, “gaṇāya bhattā”ti ettha “gaṇāyā”ti
anya-e0803n5:337_8: padaṁ sāmivacanatthe vattanato, “asakkatā casma dhanañcayāyā”ti ettha “dhanañcayāyā”ti
anya-e0803n5:337_9: padaṁ kattuvasena sāmiatthe vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:337_11: suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti “vāti kimatthaṁ saggassa gamanena vā”ti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:337_12: Evañhettha vuttanayena buddhavacanaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa
anya-e0803n5:337_13: āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede
anya-e0803n5:338_0: Nanu ca bho “candanasāraṁ jeṭṭhikāya adāsi suvaṇṇamālaṁ kaniṭṭhāyā”ti dānappayoge
anya-e0803n5:338_2: alaṅkāro, rājakaññāya chattaṁ dhāreti, rājakaññāya namo karohi, rājakaññāya sotthi
anya-e0803n5:338_3: bhavatu, rājakaññāya silāghate”tiādīhipi payogehi bhavitabbaṁ, atha kasmā “buddhavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:338_4: porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu
anya-e0803n5:338_5: catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti, na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye”ti
anya-e0803n5:338_6: vadathāti? Uppathamavatiṇṇo bhavaṁ, na hi bhavaṁ amhākaṁ vacanatthaṁ jānāti. Ayañhettha
anya-e0803n5:338_8: samasamāni honti, appāni asamāni, tasmā tāni ṭhapetvā pulliṅganapuṁsakaliṅgesu purisādi
anya-e0803n5:338_10: rūpāni buddhavacanādīsu dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissanti.
anya-e0803n5:338_11: Teneva hi “mūlāya, saggāya, dakāya, vacanāya, gaṇāyā”tiādīni gatyatthakammādīsu tīsu
anya-e0803n5:338_12: “abhiññāya, sambodhāya, nibbānāyā”ti evamādīni pana anekasatāni tiliṅgapadāni tadattheyevāti
anya-e0803n5:338_13: imesu catūsu ṭhānesu dissanti. “Deti, rocati, dhāretī”tiādīsu pana suddhasampadānavisayesu
anya-e0803n5:361: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
